description:
Local Only.

We would strongly prefer candidates who are LOCAL to the Long Beach, CA area. A VIDEO interview will be required and the selected candidate will work in a hybrid manner, with at least 2 days per week in the Long Beach office .

We need a Sr. Business Systems Analyst (BSA) for a 9+ month contract for a client in Long Beach, CA.

The client is implementing new systems in domains such as Disaster Recovery, IT Asset Management and Cybersecurity .

This new BSA resource MUST live in southern CA as he or she will need to be onsite in Long Beach part-time .

Primary responsibility will be performing as a senior business analyst and test lead under the direction of a senior project manager. Should be highly skilled in all aspects of business process analysis, Business/system requirements analysis, user support, user documentation, testing, and training.

Essential Duties

  • Assist and support senior project manager and business lead as needed
  • Represent the Department at working sessions, document business requirements
  • Identify, document, and communicate risks, issues, and status to project team
  • Document and organize test scenarios elicited from IT SMEs
  • Perform functional testing
  • Lead User Acceptance Testing and track test results
  • Lead functional issue resolution within project team
  • Create user training materials; lead user training sessions
  • Support users and system after go-live

Required Knowledge

  • Experienced with translating business requirements to system requirements
  • Functional testing experience including test scenario creation and testing of large complex systems
  • Understanding of software development life cycle processes
  • Experience creating user materials and leading user training sessions
  • Experience working on an IT system implementation team
  • Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team
  • Exceptional verbal, writing and presentation skills at all levels of the organization
  • Proficient with Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio

Required Education And Experience

  • Bachelor's Degree
  • Functional Testing Experience: Test scenario creation and testing of large complex systems
  • Experience with at least one successful full lifecycle system implementation
  • 7+ years of overall IT experience
  • Public Sector experience will be very helpful
